{"fixed_xml":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
    <BIBL>
        <TITLE>Steiners Fest-Gedancken</TITLE>
        <FORMAT>Fol.</FORMAT>
        <PRIZE>2. fl. 24. kr.</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
        <TITLE>Neues und vollkommenes Gebettbuch</TITLE>
        <FORMAT>groß 8v¼</FORMAT>
        <AUTHOR>Pfarrer Stehelin</AUTHOR>
        <PLACE>St. Gallen</PLACE>
        <PRIZE type="unbound">46. kr.</PRIZE>
        <PRIZE type="bound">fl. 1. 10. kr.</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
        <TITLE>Memoires de Rochester</TITLE>
        <FORMAT>8v¼</FORMAT>
        <PRIZE type="unbound">6. Batzen</PRIZE>
        <AUTHOR>Maupertuis</AUTHOR>
        <TITLE>Anfang der Geographie</TITLE>
        <FORMAT>8v¼</FORMAT>
        <PRIZE>6. kr.</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
        <TITLE>Messung des Meridians Gradus</TITLE>
        <FORMAT>8v¼</FORMAT>
        <PRIZE>12. Batzen</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
        <TITLE>Satura pars II.</TITLE>
        <FORMAT>8v¼</FORMAT>
        <PRIZE>18. kr.</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
        <TITLE>Gespräch von den Wärmen welche bey Anfang dieses Jahrs auf dem Schnee gefunden worden</TITLE>
        <PRIZE>8. Rappen</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
    <ADDITIONAL_INFO>
        und viele andere mehr, davon der Bericht bey Ihme zu vernemmen.
    </ADDITIONAL_INFO>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":12,"explanation":"1. Added XML declaration.
2. Fixed nested `<BIBL>` tags by properly closing and opening each `<BIBL>` tag.
3. Corrected malformed `<PRIZE>` tags (e.g., `</PRIZE> <BIBL>` to `</PRIZE><BIBL>`).
4. Fixed malformed `<PRICE>` tag (replaced with `<PRIZE>`).
5. Corrected malformed `<TITLE>` tag (fixed `Anf�ng` to `Anfang`).
6. Corrected malformed `<TITLE>` tag (fixed `Gespr�ch` to `Gespräch`).
7. Corrected malformed `<TITLE>` tag (fixed `W�armen` to `Wärmen`).
8. Fixed special characters (e.g., `gro�c` to `groß`, `8v��¼` to `8v¼`).
9. Added `type` attributes to `<PRIZE>` tags for unbound/bound books.
10. Added `<ADDITIONAL_INFO>` tag for the concluding sentence.
11. Removed stray `</BIBL>` tag.
12. Properly closed all tags and ensured correct nesting."}

parsed.fixed_xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
    <BIBL>
        <TITLE>Steiners Fest-Gedancken</TITLE>
        <FORMAT>Fol.</FORMAT>
        <PRIZE>2. fl. 24. kr.</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
        <TITLE>Neues und vollkommenes Gebettbuch</TITLE>
        <FORMAT>groß 8v¼</FORMAT>
        <AUTHOR>Pfarrer Stehelin</AUTHOR>
        <PLACE>St. Gallen</PLACE>
        <PRIZE type="unbound">46. kr.</PRIZE>
        <PRIZE type="bound">fl. 1. 10. kr.</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
        <TITLE>Memoires de Rochester</TITLE>
        <FORMAT>8v¼</FORMAT>
        <PRIZE type="unbound">6. Batzen</PRIZE>
        <AUTHOR>Maupertuis</AUTHOR>
        <TITLE>Anfang der Geographie</TITLE>
        <FORMAT>8v¼</FORMAT>
        <PRIZE>6. kr.</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
        <TITLE>Messung des Meridians Gradus</TITLE>
        <FORMAT>8v¼</FORMAT>
        <PRIZE>12. Batzen</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
        <TITLE>Satura pars II.</TITLE>
        <FORMAT>8v¼</FORMAT>
        <PRIZE>18. kr.</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
        <TITLE>Gespräch von den Wärmen welche bey Anfang dieses Jahrs auf dem Schnee gefunden worden</TITLE>
        <PRIZE>8. Rappen</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
    <ADDITIONAL_INFO>
        und viele andere mehr, davon der Bericht bey Ihme zu vernemmen.
    </ADDITIONAL_INFO>
</ITEM>
parsed.explanation:
1. Added XML declaration.
2. Fixed nested `<BIBL>` tags by properly closing and opening each `<BIBL>` tag.
3. Corrected malformed `<PRIZE>` tags (e.g., `</PRIZE> <BIBL>` to `</PRIZE><BIBL>`).
4. Fixed malformed `<PRICE>` tag (replaced with `<PRIZE>`).
5. Corrected malformed `<TITLE>` tag (fixed `Anf�ng` to `Anfang`).
6. Corrected malformed `<TITLE>` tag (fixed `Gespr�ch` to `Gespräch`).
7. Corrected malformed `<TITLE>` tag (fixed `W�armen` to `Wärmen`).
8. Fixed special characters (e.g., `gro�c` to `groß`, `8v��¼` to `8v¼`).
9. Added `type` attributes to `<PRIZE>` tags for unbound/bound books.
10. Added `<ADDITIONAL_INFO>` tag for the concluding sentence.
11. Removed stray `</BIBL>` tag.
12. Properly closed all tags and ensured correct nesting.
